actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require further review by the Federal Communications Commission to ensure thorough deliberation on proposed changes in the method of regulation of interstate basic service rates.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to terminate the proceeding in the Matter of Policy and Rules Concerning Rates for Dominant Carriers (FCC Docket No. 87-313). Prohibits the FCC from commencing comparable proceedings with respect to the interstate basic telephone service offerings of dominant carriers except in accordance with a notice of proposed rulemaking, issued after 1988, that meets criteria described in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to require further review by the Federal Communications Commission to ensure thorough deliberation on proposed changes in the method of regulation of interstate basic service rates.
